text: <@U1P1ZV6RF> the purpose of the behave tests is to perform more of an overall system test.  It actually launches networks and then acts on the network, verifying results
it can also be used to boostrap a network rapidly and use if for development purposes (fabric development)
<@U0UKTPMG8> : are you aware of any performance tests made against v 0.6 and 1.0 with pbft/sieve protos?
I would like to know about the current performance in terms of tx/s
<@U1P1ZV6RF> we have not yet reached that phase with 1.0 work, but will post asap
